Hi, I'm Zaid

Frontend Developer

About Me

Hello again, I'm Zaid, from Houston, TX.

I'm a Frontend Developer who loves to create visually-pleasing and accessible applications. I'm eager to bring my problem solving and analytical skills that I've acquired from my Software Quality Assurance experience to the world of Web Development.

Always pushing myself to grow and learn, and I look forward to bring my utmost wherever I go next.

When I am not designing websites, I do cinematography and make short cinematic music videos on YouTube. It's very fulfilling for me and has given a creative-outlet to my avocation.

Here are the technologies that I work with:

  • React
  • SASS
  • Webpack
  • CSS
  • jQuery
  • JavaScript

Skateboarders

It's an e-commerce skateboard website with all the shopping cart functionalities. I have created this in react. For styling, I have used styled-components, and for animation, I have used the framer-motion library.

  • Code
  • Live

Memory GIFs Game

This memory game is going to present six random gifs on screen. I have used giphy API to render gifs. If your selected GIF is different from the previous ones you chose, your score will increase, and a new set of random GIFs will generate. I have created this in React.

  • Code
  • Live

Employee Directory

In this project, I have used the Random User Generator API to build twelve employees directory for a startup company. For user accessibility, I have also given a search functionality and a slider to move through employees. I have created this using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

  • Code
  • Live

Words Guessing Game

A guessing game that will present random US State name with five lives to survive. I have written this in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and used jQuery for animations.

  • Code
  • Live

Portfolio

The idea behind this project was to showcase all the creations that I made recently. Being minimalistic, I wanted to keep the design clean and clear by using the 60/30/10 rule. I have written this in SASS, JavaScript, jQuery, and Webpack.

  • Code
  • Live

Interactive Photo Gallery

This is a Picture Gallery, made through Baguette Box Javascript Library, with functionality to search images based on their caption. I have created this using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

  • Code
  • Live
